instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALL framer-motion IMMEDIATELY: `npm install framer-motion` or `yarn add framer-motion`
Configure Tailwind for Dark Mode default in `index.css`: Add `@layer base { body { @apply bg-[#0F0F14] text-white; } }`
Use `framer-motion` for all entrance animations (Hero text fade-in, Character cards staggering).
Implement a 'Breathing Glow' background effect using absolute positioned divs with blur-3xl and opacity-30 that slowly scale/pulse.
Ensure ALL interactive elements (Buttons, Cards, Inputs) have a `hover` state that increases brightness or adds a glow.
The 'Telegram Link' CTA must be prominent and use the brand gradient.
Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards. Build custom glassmorphism cards using Tailwind utility classes.
Footer must contain '18+ Only' and 'Terms of Service' links.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Ensure contrast ratio is at least 4.5:1 for body text (use Zinc-400 or Zinc-300 on dark bg).
Use 'tracking-tight' for all headings to give a modern premium feel.
Avoid 100% pure black (#000000). Use #0F0F14 or #18181B for depth.
